Body:
"""
        choose values that simplify the calculations and are similar to
        observed values
    """
r = firm.get_r(Y, K, p, method)
assert np.allclose(r, expected)
pytest.mark.parametrize('Y,K,p,method,expected', [(Y1, K1, p1, 'SS',
    expected1), (Y1, K1, p2, 'SS', expected2), (Y1, K1, p3, 'SS', expected3
    ), (Y4, K4, p4, 'TPI', expected4), (Y4, K4, p5, 'TPI', expected5)], ids
    =['epsilon=1.2,SS', 'epsilon=0.5,SS', 'epsilon=1.0,SS',
    'epsilon=1.2,TP', 'epsilon=1.2,TP,varyParams'])
